synopsis.text: Able-bodied warriors are humanity's last hope against the formidable Oni, demon-like creatures wreaking havoc on Earth. Enter Dr. Saotome, a brilliant scientist who engineers colossal robots imbued with the enigmatic Getter Rays, the sole power capable of vanquishing these malevolent beasts. Leading the charge is the mighty Getter Robo, a shape-shifting robot requiring three unique pilots to harness its full potential. Enter Ryoma Nagare, a skilled martial artist; Hayato Jin, a ruthless terrorist; and Benkei Musashibou, a gentle giant devoted to Buddhism. Together, this unlikely trio forms the Getter Team, united in their quest to eradicate the Oni threat and safeguard humanity's future.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
